title: Fontlab Studio Warning Output - opentype
content:
Can anyone help please - I suddenly get this warning in Fontlab Studio when generating an OpenType font - I haven't changed anything with my metrics key dimension settings.

[WARNING] The feature file OS/2 overrides TypoAscender and TypoDescender do not sum to the font em-square.

What does this mean and where do I correct this? There are no help files and the manual doesn't help!

thanks
author: tabbycat

comments.content:
Reading through this thread should help you to resolve your problem and give you a thorough grounding in the related issues from a range of experts:

[http://typophile.com/node/77906](http://web.archive.org/web/20140810053456/http:/typophile.com/node/77906 "http://typophile.com/node/77906")
